articles.title: Apple announces changes to iOS, Safari, and the App Store in the European Union - Apple
articles.description: Apple announced changes to iOS, Safari, and the App Store impacting developers’ apps in the EU to comply with the DMA.
articles.content:

articles.title: Capturing the ripples of spacetime: LISA gets go-ahead - European Space Agency
articles.description: Today, ESA’s Science Programme Committee approved the Laser Interferometer Space Antenna (LISA) mission, the first scientific endeavour to detect and study gravitational waves from space.
